about_the_game:
Electric Alps is a 2D puzzle game based on real-world electrical engineering. Explore how electricity works. Plan your circuitry, install devices and solve logic-based wiring problems.

You take on the role of an electrician, returning to the remote village of St. Ampere, nestled in the breathtaking Austrian Alps. Tasked with wiring up homes and structures, you’ll master the principles of electrical engineering. Install cables, switches, and other electrical devices, strategically wiring them up to create functional circuits. Each building is a puzzle, requiring your skills to power it up. Your journey will ultimately transform the village, awakening it from its unpowered slumber. One circuit at a time.

⚡ Based on Real-World Electricity

Explore the fundamentals of electrical engineering, delving into real-world electricity. Understand the principles of current flow and master the art of wiring in this hands-on and educational experience.

🧠 Solve Puzzle-Based Circuitries

Engage wiring challenges that combine logic, strategic planning and your new-found electrical knowledge to solve a variety of puzzles in the world of electrical installations.

🛠️ Utilize a Vast Toolbox

Explore a vast array of devices and appliances as you advance through St. Ampere. From installing sockets to crafting intricate power consumption systems, you master various electrical activities, adding switches, relays, motion detectors, fuses, RCDs and other tools to your toolbox.

🏡 Electrify Your Village

As you advance, St. Ampere around you evolves. Overcoming challenges not only opens up new areas, introduces fresh devices but also revitalizes the village. Homes become inhabited, structures turn usable, and green, sustainable energy production takes center stage, transforming St. Ampere into a vibrant, electrified haven.

⛰️ Enjoy the Alpine Charm

Enjoy Austrian culture and the breathtaking Alps. The picturesque alpine landscapes aren't merely a background, but an integral part of your exploration, adding our Austrian charm to your journey through St. Ampere.

short_description: You are an electrician, moving back to your hometown in the Austrian Alps, which you find lacks a certain... spark. Promptly tasked with wiring up the village, you solve electrical puzzles, blow fuses and master real-world circuitry techniques. Electrify the Alps, one circuit at a time.
